Attack <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target:.0f}</> targets simultaneously, however only target <@ba.rem>blocked</> enemies. The mark explodes after <@ba.vup>{paper_duration:.0f}</> seconds, dealing <@ba.vup>{default_atk_scale:.0%}</> Arts damage to nearby enemies. Drones <@ba.vup>+{attack@cnt}</> , ATK<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Send out <@ba.vup>special form</> Drones, each of which pursues the nearest enemy across the battlefield. skchr_etlchi_3.name: 灵与欲的惜别
desc:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, summon corresponding Heart Candles up to <@ba.vup>3</> ground enemies with the highest HP within Attack Range. When attacking the Heart Candles, deals at least <@ba.vup>35%</> ATK damage every attack. Each Heart Candle inherit <@ba.vdown>{attack@max_hp_scale:0%}</> of the target's current HP, when attacked the target also receive the same amount of damage. 
<@ba.rem>Heart Candles can only be attacked by Entelechia</>
